name: Summer Bucket List
description:
Explore Playa Bonita while collecting hibiscus and Scarab Tablets!

It can be played with both Gamepad and Keyboard + Mouse (the default layout is for the Xbox controller). You can rearrange input for Keyboard + Mouse.

The Controls Menu can be accessed with Esc or Select (Gamepad) while the Settings Menu with Enter or Start (Gamepad). Camera sensitivity and other settings can be changed in the Settings Menu.

[Currently it can only be played on Windows 64-bit]

If there is an issue during gameplay, please let me know, I'll gladly try to help you.

- Thank you for playing!
